view.description: Environment filesystem view configuration for creating a directory with traditional structure where all files of installed packages are linked

anyOf.description: Enable or disable default views. If 'true', the view is generated under .spack-env/view
Path where the default view should be created
Advanced view configuration with one or more named view descriptors

additionalProperties.description: Named view descriptor (use 'default' for the view activated with environment)

root.description: Root directory path where the view will be created

link.description: Which specs to include: 'all' (environment roots with transitive run+link deps), 'run' (environment roots with transitive run deps), 'roots' (environment roots only)

link_type.description: How files are linked in the view: 'symlink' (default), 'hardlink', or 'copy'

select.description: List of specs to include in the view (default: select everything)

exclude.description: List of specs to exclude from the view (default: exclude nothing)

projections.description: Customize directory structure and naming schemes by mapping specs to format strings.

all.description: Default projection format string used as fallback for all specs that do not match other entries. Uses spec format syntax like "{name}/{version}/{hash:16}".

additionalProperties.description: Projection format string for specs matching this key. Uses spec format syntax supporting tokens like {name}, {version}, {compiler.name}, {^dependency.name}, etc.
